verb.description: Become fully aware of (something) as a fact; understand clearly.
examples: he realized his mistake at once
they realized that something was wrong
she had not realized how hungry she was
synonyms: be aware of the fact that
become aware of the fact that
be conscious of the fact that
become conscious of the fact that

verb.description: Cause (something desired or anticipated) to happen.
examples: his worst fears have been realized
our loans are helping small business realize their dreams

verb.description: Give actual or physical form to.
examples: the stage designs have been beautifully realized

verb.description: Make (money or a profit) from a transaction.

origin: Early 17th century: from real, on the pattern of French réaliser.
